nodes.text: Captain Piedell was a man who served the Galactic Empire as an officer during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Piedell held the rank of captain and served as the administrative assistant to Zerex, the Moff of the Meridian sector. When Zerex held a party in his mansion on the frozen planet Ord Adinorr to celebrate his promotion to moff, Piedell attended. During the celebration, Piedell commanded a detachment of ten snowtroopers, whom he ordered to patrol outside the mansion and guard sensitive locations within it.
